about_the_game:
This Game is a storygame in VR. You are placed in a city named "Evia". Everything you see is out of a "giant perspective".
You can explore the city by walking or using the controller and pull yourself through. You are also able to slide the map up and down and adjust the volume.
In the city itself there is lot for you to discover. Besides there are 12 hidden Scenes (+1) and one that can be explored and will tell you one explicit story.
Attached above the controller there is a "Timeline" that shows you what scene in the chronological line you have already found.
As soon as you are in front of one particular scene the controller should "vibrate" and fill out the timeline.
When you have found all 12 Scenes a new one will reveal. Find it again and the story of Evia is solved! Or has it just began?

content_descriptors.notes:
The game deals with a fantasy-creature being chased by a mob of the town's inhabitants.
A drunken inhabitant shoots the creature at the end of the game. The death of the creature is shown on screen.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD FX 8350
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Room Scale 3m by 3m area required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: In the city of “Evia” several residents are infected with light. A girl discovers what appears to be the host. It befriends it, feeds it and houses it. Not to the delight of the other residents. They want to drive the landlord away. A persecution begins ...
